entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make Http Logging Middleware Endpoint aware #43222
  • Severe blazor server memory leak #43221
  • OperationCanceledException thrown from Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.ConfigurationManager.GetConfigurationAsync while trying to get Jwt tokens #43220
  • Blazor Websocket disconnects when not authenticated (AllowAnonymous) #43218
  • Testserver doesn't validate dependency injection as a normal host server #43217
  • localhost connection refused #43215
  • Support multiple keys per issuer in options from config #43206

Closed

  • Support running endpoints filters in MVC #42799
    7.0-rc1
  • [Blazor WASM] InputSelect: binding no longer works with negative numbers #42064
    7.0-rc1
  • Blazor Wasm is not Caching DLL files when loaded from IFrame #43086
  • The "ProcessFrameworkReferences" task failed unexpectedly. #43186
  • Azure SignalR doesn't process messages in order under high load #43213
  • jquery-validation-unobstrusive in samples is licensed under a non-open source license #34785
    7.0-rc1
  • Error: "The entity type 'DataProtectionKey' requires a primary key" when using .Net 7 previews #43187
    7.0-rc2
  • Cannot add `scoped` AuthorizationHandler in .NET 7 Preview 7 #43188
  • Improve the ANCM error when an app fails to start #43152
    7.0-rc1
  • Data annotation ErrorMessage not working in asp.net core 6 razor pages for DateTime property #42991

PullRequests

Created

  • Exclude some .wxl files from localization #43226
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for running final conventions during build #43225
  • Retry tests #43224
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix typo in trimmer annotation #43219
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Avoid failed authN log when the endpoint has IAllowAnonymous metadata #43212
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Only create context if an event is set #43211
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Reuse PolicyAuthorizationResult #43210
    area-security, community-contribution

Merged

  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557
    area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • Add missing "Blazor" project type tag for empty Blazor project templates #43045
    area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • Add Web Application Builder analyzers/fixers and tests #42724
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Revert Dispose in IIS tests #43199
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Update DataProtectionKey to use DynamicDependency #43207
    area-dataprotection, 7.0-rc1
  • Fixed the license value for the jquery-validation-unobtrusive repo #43196
    area-security, 7.0-rc1
  • Consolidate error pages used by ANCM and improve link #43170
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix check for auth services in middleware auto-registration #43205
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Dynamic include DataProtectionKey.Id #43204
    area-dataprotection, area-runtime, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Fix MVC form data binding localization #43182
    area-mvc
  • [SignalR] [.NET Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #42671
    area-signalr
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Cache effective policy in endpoint metadata #43124
    area-security, api-suggestion
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr
  • Updating HttpMethodMetadata based on ICorsMetadata #43077
    area-web-frameworks
  • Sync output cache with API review #43121
    area-runtime
  • HTTP/3: Support QUIC idle timeout more cleanly #43037
    area-runtime
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
  • RateLimitingMiddleware updates #43053
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Add LF request line terminator option #43202
    area-runtime
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 7.0-rc1
